result.reason: VNC clipboard sharing is always enabled with no per-connection toggle; need a VNCClipboardRedirect property like RDP has
result.approach: Add a VNCClipboardRedirect bool property (default true for backward compat) to AbstractConnectionRecord and ConnectionInfoInheritance. In ProtocolVNC.SetEventHandlers(), only subscribe to FrmMain.ClipboardChanged when the property is true. Update all serializers/deserializers to persist the new field.

attempts.raw_output:
The issue is clear. The VNC implementation always subscribes to clipboard changes (line 398 in `Connection.Protocol.VNC.cs`) with no way to disable it. A `VNCClipboardRedirect` boolean property is needed, similar to how RDP has clipboard redirect options.
